Gulp SVG Sprites (5 icons in <symbol> mode)

Files Generated:

  1. svg/symbols.svg

Usage:

  1. Include the contents of the SVG file just after the opening <body> tag.
  2. Paste one of the snippets anywhere into your website.

  • bulletin


    <svg class="icon bulletin"><use xlink:href="#bulletin"></use></svg>

  • contact


    <svg class="icon contact"><use xlink:href="#contact"></use></svg>

  • events


    <svg class="icon events"><use xlink:href="#events"></use></svg>

  • logo


    <svg class="icon logo"><use xlink:href="#logo"></use></svg>

  • our-story


    <svg class="icon our-story"><use xlink:href="#our-story"></use></svg>

Generated by Gulp Svg Sprites - Preview page courtesy of iconizr.
